item.title: Waymo to launch a robotaxi service in Nashville in 2026
item.description: Waymo is bringing its robotaxis to Music City, USA. The Alphabet-owned company plans on launching its robotaxi service in Nashville in 2026. Customers will be able to hail a ride initially through the

item.title: Here Come the Robotaxis: Zoox and Lyft Both Launch Driverless Ride Sharing
item.description: Two new self-driving car services—one in Atlanta from Lyft and May Mobility, another in Las Vegas from Amazon subsidiary Zoox—prove that the robotaxi race is still on. Now comes the hard part.

item.title: Here Come the Robotaxis: Zoox and Lyft Both Launch Driverless Ride Sharing

item.title: Lyft’s self-driving shuttle buses are coming soon
item.description: Lyft is partnering with Benteler Mobility to launch a self-driving shuttle service. In late 2026, Lyft plans to deploy the company’s all-electric Holon Urban shuttles in airports and cities around the
